name: Mario Pais

s001p003s00022727e00030500.question_text: What things do you always make sure to lead by example on?

title: Senior Chief, Lead NECC UMS Instructor

Go ahead, ask me who gave me the best ad: Go ahead, ask me who gave me the best advice about my career.
I don't have an answer for that.
I don't have enough information to talk: I don't have enough information to talk about that.
I haven't always made perfect decisions,: I haven't always made perfect decisions, so you can ask him about any failures I've had.
I might have covered this already.
I've done a lot of technical training in: I've done a lot of technical training in the Navy, so you can ask me about what skills I've learned.
That is a great question but unfortunate: That's a great question. Unfortunately, I don't have an answer for that right now.
That is a great question, unfortunately: That's a great question. Unfortunately, I never recorded an answer for that.
That is a great question. I wish I'd tho: That's a great question. I wish I thought of that.
This changes pretty quickly, so what I t: this changes pretty quickly. So what I tell you today might change tomorrow would be best if you ask somebody local who can point you in the right direction.
Unfortunately I was never asked that que: Unfortunately, I was never asked that.
What do you want to know about leadershi: What do you want to know about leadership?
What do you want to know about me?: What do you want to know about me?
What do you want to know?: What do you want to know?
What do you want to talk about?: What do you want to talk about?
What kinds of questions can I ask you ab: What kind of questions can I ask you about?
What would you like to ask me?: What would you like to ask me?
You could ask for tips about your first: you can ask about tips as your first month as a leader.
You could ask me about getting your life: you could ask me about getting your life set up for a big move.
you could ask me about my background.
You could ask me about my go-to leadersh: you could ask me about my go to leadership strategy.
You could ask me about my job in the Nav: you could ask me about my job in the Navy.
You could ask me about serious problems,: you could ask me about serious problems like sexual harassment or suicide.
you might have to ask me something else.
_INTRO_: Hi, I'm Mario. I'm a senior chief petty officer in the Navy. Or I'm stationed in San Diego at Explosive Ordnance Disposal Training Unit One I've currently serving as the Navy Expeditionary Combat Commands lead unmanned underwater vehicle instructor and curriculum developer for the entire force. Having worked in that role, I've deployed multiple times to the fifth Fleet a O. R. Working in Bahrain and all throughout that region, up and down the Gulf and the Gulf of Aden. And in those areas, I'm married with two kids, both of which are in high school.
_OFF_TOPIC_: That's a good question, but I want to make sure I tell you something.
_PROMPT_: Here's something you should really know.
_REPEAT_: I may have said this before.
